heading: This Afternoon
text: Decreasing clouds, except partly to mostly cloudy in far northenr New York.
temperature: Upper 20s to mid 30s, mid 20s far north

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy north, becoming mostly clear south.
temperature: Zero to 10 above, cold spots around 5 below

heading: Saturday
text: Breezy. Chance of a flurry or sprinkle far north.
temperature: Upper 30s to mid 40s north,  mid to upper 40s south
